mods.abstract: The map seems to relate to letter No. C/PA-247 from the Chief Local Representative, The Bahrain Petroleum Company, to the Political Agent, Bahrain dated 13 May 1946 (folio 267).Map prepared by the Bahrain Petroleum Company from Admiralty charts and other information on record showing Bahrain, the coasts of Saudi Arabia and Qatar, and waters to the north, with shoals and reefs mapped in detail.The map is marked with reference points lettered A-J corresponding to locations for structure drilling operations as set out in the letter on folio 267, and green and red lines described as 'Hay's Line' and 'Galloway's Line' showing the proposed division of territorial waters between Bahrain and Qatar.
